Class: LoggerFactory

LoggerFactory

Factory class for getting access to loggers. See Logger for more information.

new LoggerFactory()

Methods

<static> get(name, hierarchical)

Returns an instance of the logger with given name. Settings of the logger are taken from global configuration (see Config.init). Default global logLevel is Logger.LEVEL_WARN.

Successive calls with the same logger name return the same logger instance.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the logger. Typically, it's a fully-qualified name of the component that uses the logger, e.g. "My.Namespace.Component".
hierarchical boolean

Whether the logger shall inherit settings from its parent package names, e.g. whether logger with name "My.Namespace" should inherit logLevel from "My" or from root (hierarchical = true, default) or only settings directly for "My.Namespace" apply (hierarchical = false). The parameter is used only during 1st invocation for given logger name, in successive calls it's ignored.
Returns:

An instance of the logger with given name.

Type
UuApp.Logging.Logger
